SELECT OBD.ID AS outboundId, IT.ID AS itemId, IT.NAME AS itemName, MT.ID AS materialId, MT.NAME AS materialName, ST.ID AS storageId, ST.NAME AS storageName, OBD.QUANTITY, OBD.OUT_DATE AS outDate, OBD.CATEGORY_CODE AS categoryCode, CAT.NAME AS categoryName, OBD.STATUS_CODE AS statusCode, STS.NAME AS statusName
FROM OUTBOUND OBD LEFT JOIN ITEM IT ON OBD.ITEM_ID = IT.ID LEFT JOIN MATERIAL MT ON OBD.MATERIAL_ID = MT.ID JOIN STORAGE ST ON OBD.STORAGE_ID = ST.ID LEFT JOIN DETAIL_SYS_CODE CAT ON OBD.CATEGORY_CODE = CAT.DETAIL_CODE AND CAT.MAIN_CODE = 'ITP' LEFT JOIN DETAIL_SYS_CODE STS ON OBD.STATUS_CODE = STS.DETAIL_CODE AND STS.MAIN_CODE = 'STS'
AND ( IT.NAME LIKE '%' || #{srhItemOrItemName} || '%' OR MT.NAME LIKE '%' || #{srhItemOrItemName} || '%' )
ORDER BY OBD.OUT_DATE DESC
